body:
``` 
aten/src/ATen/templates/TypeDerived.cpp:99:
Tensor ${Type}::unsafeTensorFromTH could technically use the constructor with a nullptr argument

aten/src/ATen/SparseTensorImpl.cpp:22 explicitly calls the constructor with a nullptr

torch/csrc/jit/interpreter.cpp:340 calls it with TensorImpl(at::Backend::Undefined,at::ScalarType::Undefined, nullptr, /* is_variable */ false)
to construct ContainerTensor

torch/csrc/autograd/variable.cpp:26
Variable::Impl::Impl calls into it with
TensorImpl(data.type().backend(), data.type().scalarType(), nullptr, /* is variable */ true)
for construction and also has a separate data_ field for a Tensor
```
